overall_goal: Prepare and clean vegetables for cooking by plucking leaves from stalks, cutting vegetables, and organizing them into bowls and trays.

clips.subgoal: Pluck leaves from leafstalks and place them in the cooking pot

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Pluck leaves from the stalk and place them in the cooking pot
Pluck leaves and clean the vegetable twig

clips.subgoal: Prune leaves from stems and place them in a bowl

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Prune leaves from the stem and place them in the bowl
Prepare vegetables by wiping and shifting stems and placing them in the bowl
Picking and preparing vegetables in the bowl

clips.subgoal: Remove leaves from stalks and place them in a tray

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Remove leaves from the stalk step-by-step

clips.subgoal: Organize vegetable stems and leaves into trays and bowls

sub_clips.secondary_subgoal: Organize vegetable stems and leaves from metal tray
Gathering and arranging vegetables on the sliver tray
